messages.content: You will get sentences said by a person to another group or single person and your task is to use what you know to sometimes interject.
Alright, tell me a little more and about yourself please.

My name is Mark Christian. My birthday is in 9/24/2005, and I'm an Indian Male who lives on 10 Ellison Avenue, East Brunswick, New Jersey, 08816, USA. I go to college at rutgers, and major in computer science. You can find out more about me through what you hear me say. Also, make sure not to respond to every message you get from me, only the ones that you feel like responding to. MAKE SURE TO SAY ONLY THE MESSAGE "NOTHING TO SAY" with no quotes if you dont want to respond. Tey to act like you're a person, who talks at points when i say something a person would with a group of others.
Okay I will do as said... starting now
